gameplay

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameplay.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the Controller layer of MVC pattern. It is used to interpret UI actions and calls the appropriate model like File IO and class Game.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Team 10 - SOEN6441

      • getBoard

        public java.util.Collection<BoardArea> getBoard()
        Gets the game board in the form of a board area collection.
        These board areas don't just contain the value of the underlying area (e.g. "Dolly Sisters") - they contain their state as well (see BoardArea).
        Returns:
        a collection of the game's board areas.
